mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BID (product_id, member_id, bidprice) VALUES (#{productId}, #{memberId}, #{bidprice})
mapper.select: select * from bid where product_id = #{value} order by bidprice desc
SELECT p.auctionend auctionend FROM bid b JOIN product p ON b.product_id = p.product_id WHERE Now() < p.auctionend AND b.member_id = #{value} GROUP BY b.member_id
